title: (◕ܫ◕✿) Looking for Clash players! (◕ܫ◕✿) ~~~READ DESCRIPTION~~~
body:
Hey guys, we've currently got 2 members (myself and my best friend Alexis) and looking for some players for Clash!  We're really looking forward to clash because we've never done it before so we need some players that are chill and kinda good at the same time? We're don't think we can win the whole thing but we will certainly try and have tonnes of fun at the same time! (❦ ᴗ ❦ ✿)

So if you're willing to put up with us quirky girls and have LOADS of fun add Alexis' IGN: Didnt ask.

So don't add my account because I'm not the leader, add 'Didnt ask' !!! (◕ ꒳ ◕✿)

Stay saucy! xoxoxo

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
Silver 2 egirl, is support taken? Add me!

{{sticker:katarina-love}}

Hey, sounds like you girls need a strong Indian male presence. Add me!

{{sticker:galio-happy}}
Hey guys, I appreciate the love in the replies, but we will accept anyone, as we really want to play Clash this time round!! {{sticker:leblanc-funny}}
I am not a girl, but would I be able to join? {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}

Hello!!! I'm super keen for clash too! My girlfriend recently broke up with me 2 days ago so I suppose I'm looking for some fun to lift my spirits as well! ...and maybe if I find someone on the team I click with maybe we can be more than clash team members? Hoping for either/or, kinda desperate rn ngl...

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

hey I'll join! add me! thanks!

{{sticker:darius-angry}}

Hey, Kirt Here, I have two account gold4 (mangomelon) and plat 4 (luxthreshluluali) i main support and jungle, im really dominate early, im good with communication and shot calling, im competitive but also non toxic and kinda just wanna have fun, please add me ty, im really desperate for a clash team atm

I sent you a friend request. I have three players including myself and thus we require two more, and by the look of your accounts, the roles work out rather nicely (mid and sup). Two of us are high plat in solo/duo and diamond flex, the other is diamond solo/duo. Currently a Tier II team.

If you prefer, contact me on my discord handle @ megan#1032

Hey guys. I am a Silver 2 ADC main but I can play all lanes you can look up account in op.gg and I rarely get bad kda on ashe.
On a side note, I am addicted to invading their JG level 1.
